title: Latin America wakes up to the problem of plastic straws - UNEP
body: For the time being, Antigua and Barbuda is the only country in Latin America and the Caribbean with a national ban on single-use plastics, including straws. Belize approved a similar measure that will come into force in 2019 and Costa Rica has pledged to become single-use plastics-free by 2021. The Chamber of Deputies in Mexico approved this ...
